headline: Pedal off the Metal: Detroit’s Big 3 Brace for Slowing Sales in ’26
summary: US automakers General Motors, Stellantis (formerly Fiat Chrysler) and Ford are bracing for slowing sales in 2026 amid rising unemployment.

raw.headline: Pedal off the Metal: Detroit’s Big 3 Brace for Slowing Sales in ’26
raw.summary: US automakers General Motors, Stellantis (formerly Fiat Chrysler) and Ford are bracing for slowing sales in 2026 amid rising unemployment.

headline: EV Sales Stall as Buyers Shift to Hybrids
summary: The last three months of 2025 are only the start of a downturn for EV sales: The pace is expected to keep slowing next year.

raw.headline: EV Sales Stall as Buyers Shift to Hybrids
raw.summary: The last three months of 2025 are only the start of a downturn for EV sales: The pace is expected to keep slowing next year.

headline: Is Ford a Dividend Stock Worth Buying for 2026 After Its 34% Rise This Year?
summary: While Ford is up 34% for the year and has a healthy dividend yield of 4.5%, the stock's 2026 forecast does not look too bright.

raw.headline: Is Ford a Dividend Stock Worth Buying for 2026 After Its 34% Rise This Year?
raw.summary: While Ford is up 34% for the year and has a healthy dividend yield of 4.5%, the stock's 2026 forecast does not look too bright.
